citation.article_title: Progress of blue carbon research: 12 years of global trends based on content analysis of peer-reviewed and ‘gray literature’ documents
citation.author: Quevedo
citation.unstructured_citation: Quevedo, J. M. D., Uchiyama, Y., & Kohsaka, R. (2023). citation.volume_title: Coastal blue carbon: Methods for assessing carbon stocks and emissions factors in mangroves, tidal salt marshes, and seagrass meadows.
